#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
          char a[ 100 ];
          char b[ 100 ];
          int t;
          scanf( "%d", &t );
          while( t-- ){
          scanf( "%s", &a );
          scanf("%s", &b );
          int n = strlen( a );
          int m = strlen( b );
          int q = 0;
          int result = 0;
          int result1 = 0;
          for( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ){
                   if( a[ i ] == b[ q ] ){
                          q++;
                   }
                   if( q == m ){
                         result = result + 1;
                         break;
                   }
          }
          q = m-1;
          for( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ){
                   if( a[ i ] == b[ q ] ){
                          q--;
                   }
                   if( q == -1 ){
                         result1 = result1 + 1;
                         break;
                   }
          }
          if( result > 0 && result1 == 0 ){
                     printf( "1\n" );
          }else if( result == 0 && result1 > 0 ){
                     printf( "2\n");
          }else if( result > 0 && result1 > 0 ){
                     printf( "3\n" );
          }else{
                     printf( "0\n" );
          }
                           
          }
         
          return 0;
}
